alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 04 at 8:15AM EST until January 04 at 8:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 715 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 19 miles southeast of Vernon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Jackson, northeastern Bay and northern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, including the following locations... Betts, Moose Pond, Red Oak, Altha, Fountain, Chason, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill and Camps Head. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
